body_html:
I'm having the same problem. Running Anaconda on Windows. I've created an environment and installed python 3.5 it in.

$ python --version
Python 3.5.3 :: Continuum Analytics, Inc.
(py35_64)

When I execute

pip install --ignore-installed --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/windows/cpu/tensorflow-1.2.1-cp35-cp35m-win_amd64.whl

I get the error:

 tensorflow-1.2.1-cp35-cp35m-win_amd64.whl is not a supported wheel on this platform.

body:
I'm having the same problem. Running Anaconda on Windows. I've created an environment and installed python 3.5 it in.
```    
$ python --version
Python 3.5.3 :: Continuum Analytics, Inc.
(py35_64)
```
When I execute 
```
pip install --ignore-installed --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/windows/cpu/tensorflow-1.2.1-cp35-cp35m-win_amd64.whl
```
I get the error:
```  
 tensorflow-1.2.1-cp35-cp35m-win_amd64.whl is not a supported wheel on this platform.
```
